headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://*.walletconnect.org; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://*.walletconnect.org; frame-src 'self' https://secure.walletconnect.org https://*.walletconnect.org; frame-ancestors 'self' https://secure.walletconnect.org https://*.vercel.app https://*.ngrok-free.app https://secure-mobile.walletconnect.com https://secure-mobile.walletconnect.org
